full_output.summary: Im a recent graduate with a degree in Computer Applications and hands-on experience in Java, JavaScript, and web development. Im eager to start my career and bring my skills in programming and problem-solving to a new team.

projects.name: E-COMMERCE
projects.description: Developed a Spring Boot project (version 3.2.0) that includes features for customer registration, purchasing items, and managing sellers. Designed and managed a MySQL database with 7 tables for efficient data storage and retrieval. Implemented design patterns like transformer and builder to ensure clean and maintainable code, promoting code reuse and readability.

projects.name: Course Mania
projects.description: Built a course management system with Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL, making data entry easier and reducing manual work. Designed a solid system using Hibernate, JPA, and JDBC, making sure it can handle growth and stay stable. Tested the system with Postman to check reliability, ensuring most API responses worked well.

projects.name: N Queens Visualizer
projects.description: The n-queens puzzle is the problem of placing N queens on an N x N chessboard. No 2 queens attack each other. Given an integer N(user input), we will show all distinct solutions to the N-queens puzzle.

full_output.name: Nitesh Choudhary
